description: Super easy but a little special and tasty.
name: Caramel Apple Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 1 hour and 20 minutes or until golden and tested with a skewer. Once cooked let it stand in the tin for 5-10 minutes then turn over on a serving plate or cooling rack so the cake now becomes upside down and the apple is the top.
